item.description:
Falmouth Community Programs is sponsoring a monthly Laughter Yoga session. **PRE-REGISTRATION is required in case of any changes to the schedule. Best way to pre-register is by emailing Denise at DMacaronas@town.falmouth.me.us or leave a message for her at 781-5253, ext. 5324. Information needed includes Name, Address, Phone Number, Email, Date of Birth, Special Needs (if applicable) - also, an emergency contact may be helpful.

Laughter Yoga is a simple, yet very powerful form of exercise that everyone can do anywhere and anytime. Learn the benefits of laughing for no reason at all. Laughter exercises are combined with short and deep breathing techniques. Leave the class with joy in your heart and feeling both happy and relaxed. Previous experience not necessary. Pre-registration required.
item.name: Laughter Yoga Session
